info.description:
Conformance requirements for NHS Digital EPS Futures

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[Electronic Prescription Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/electronic-prescription-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.medicines.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/nhsdigital-medicines/home)||
 |[UKCore.Release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)|1.2.2-prerelease|

tags.name: MedicationRequest
tags.description:
An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient. The resource is called "MedicationRequest" rather than "MedicationPrescription" or "MedicationOrder" to generalize the use across inpatient and outpatient settings, including care plans, etc., and to harmonize with workflow patterns.

 Profile (constraints): [NHSDigital-MedicationRequest-Contained](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital-Medicines/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-MedicationRequest-Contained.guide.md)

tags.name: MedicationDispense
tags.description:
Indicates that a medication product is to be or has been dispensed for a named person/patient.  This includes a description of the medication product (supply) provided and the instructions for administering the medication.  The medication dispense is the result of a pharmacy system responding to a medication order.

 Profile (constraints): [NHSDigital-MedicationDispense](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital-Medicines/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-MedicationDispense.guide.md)

get.description:
[search](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html) for MedicationRequest instances.

The EPS Tracker.

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
Returns prescriptions for a specific patient

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | patient | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|   MedicationRequest.subject.identifier |

parameters.name: intended-performer
parameters.description:
Return prescriptions for this medication reference

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | intended-performer | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  MedicationRequest.performer |

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Status of the prescription

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | status | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|   MedicationRequest.status | 


 A code from FHIR ValueSet [medicationrequest Status](http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationrequest-status)

parameters.name: requester.identifier
parameters.description:
Returns prescriptions prescribed by this prescriber

 Chained search parameter. Please see [chained](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#chaining)

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | requester | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  MedicationRequest.requester | 
| identifier | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  RelatedPerson.identifier |

parameters.name: group
parameters.description:
Returns grouped prescriptions

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | group | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  MedicationRequest.groupIdentifier |

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description:
How many results to return

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | _count | [number ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#number)|  null |

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

post.description:
[create](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/http.html#create) a new MedicationRequest instance.

**Create a new prescription**. Equivalent to `prescription-order` message in NextGen

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

patch.description:
[patch](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/http.html#patch) a resource instance of type MedicationRequest by ID.

Replaces part of the functionality in cancel prescription

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
The identity of a patient to list dispenses for

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | patient | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|   MedicationDispense.subject.identifier |

parameters.name: prescription
parameters.description:
The identity of a prescription to list dispenses from

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | prescription | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  MedicationDispense.authorizingPrescription |

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Returns dispenses with a specified dispense status

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | status | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|   MedicationDispense.status | 


 A code from FHIR ValueSet [MedicationDispense Status Codes](http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicationdispense-status)

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description:
How many results to return

 | Name | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------|--------| 
 | _count | [number ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#number)|  null |
